nio/Replicator.description: Each incoming signal is replicated x times, where x is the number of items in the list that `list` evaluates to. Each output signal will be the same as the input signal with a new attribute, `title`, set to a value of the list.

list.title: List
list.description: An expression property that needs to evaluate to a list. A signal will be notified from the block for each item in the list.

title.title: Attribute Title
title.description: Name of attribute to be added with list value.
